title: SALT GYPSY DUSTY – PU
desc: Imagine riding in an old Cadillac… You know how the old classic cars just seem to glide and almost float along the road? Well, that’s exactly the feel on offer with the Salt Gypsy Dusty Longboard; a more retro style Longboard with rails and some traditional bottom contours to ensure the whole length of the board is usable.
features: The Huevo, in SLX construction, is a classic hybrid surfboard that incorporates the best of both the shortboard and longboard. It’s round nose and fuller tail gives plenty of floatation and makes paddling a breeze. With its shorter length and 2 + 1 fin set up makes for fast responsive turns and manoeuvrability.

title: THREE PALMS BOARD CO DUE BACK HIGHLINE – MX
desc: Three Palms Due Back surfboards are made using our tough Moulded Epoxy (MX) construction and are designed specifically for the rental market. This model uses the Modern Highline as its base shape. We have an excess of volume to make those early learning stages easy.
features: The Huevo, in SLX construction, is a classic hybrid surfboard that incorporates the best of both the shortboard and longboard. It’s round nose and fuller tail gives plenty of floatation and makes paddling a breeze. With its shorter length and 2 + 1 fin set up.
dimensions: Gnaraloo Beach Cruiser surfboards provide the ultimate in fun and safety for beginner surfers. Theses boards are incredibly buoyant, stable, and easy to ride.
